sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input type="password" v-model="pwd">

</template>

<script>
import { getAuth, updatePassword } from '@firebase/auth'
import { ref } from 'vue'

export default {
    setup() {

        const auth = getAuth()

        const user = auth.currentUser

        const pwd = ref("")

        updatePassword(user, pwd.value)
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
